price: a zatim mu, za kaznu, na glavu vodu koja ključa izlijevajte!
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
